detail_desc: Tuxedo trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Diagonal side pockets, fake jetted back pockets and legs with satin stripes down the sides and creases.
Hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fasteners in one side, side pockets and extra-wide legs.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Super-wide culottes in a cupro weave with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Inset panels down the legs for added width.
Super-wide culottes in a cupro weave with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Inset panels down the legs for added width.
Super-wide culottes in a cupro weave with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Inset panels down the legs for added width.
Super-wide culottes in a cupro weave with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Inset panels down the legs for added width.
Wide shorts in a jacquard weave. High waist with pleats, a zip fly and button and concealed pockets in the side seams.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Padded slippers in jersey with an embroidered motif at the top. Fleece linings. pile insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Calf-length skirt in soft, stretch velour with a high waist and draping at the front. Concealed zip at the back and a slit at the front. Lined.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and patch pockets. Lined.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and patch pockets. Lined.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and patch pockets. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the back of the waist and crossover straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Buttons at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and elasticated hems.

Baby Exclusive. Dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with elastication at the back of the waist and crossover straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Buttons at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and elasticated hems.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and embroidery and appliqués on the knees.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a shirt collar and hem section in woven fabric, concealed press-studs at the top, an open chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with elastication at the back of the waist, a fake fly with a decorative button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket with a button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist with wide elastication.
Tunic in an airy weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Tunic in an airy weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a text print, a seam at the hips and flared skirt.
